prompt: Create a minimalist chat list page with a soft gray background and a transparent app bar with the title 'Chats' in bold black text, blending seamlessly with the body. Include a search icon on the app bar. The scrollable chat list should have each item with a 46px circular profile picture on the left in a muted green, contact name in bold dark gray text, message preview in light gray, and timestamp in small light gray text on the right. Use no dividers between items, but apply 20px vertical padding for spacing. Ensure a clean, airy layout with smooth scrolling and responsive design.
